DOC.brief_title: A Study Survivorship Service Capacities Among Health Care Agencies New York City
DOC.detailed_description: To describe range service available cancer survivor NYC area . To determine organization ' need assistance enhance service survivor .
DOC.criteria: To eligible participate study , agency must : 1 . Be current provider either : General health service ( GHS ) , primary care , health education wellness , mental health service , home health care , palliative care , cancer screen diagnosis ; Cancerspecific medical treatment ( CMT ) , cancer surgery , radiation , chemotherapy , hormonal therapy ; experimental therapy ; cancer pain symptom management ; rehabilitation service ; posttreatment monitoring surveillance ; prophylactic treatment , chemoprevention ; Any type specialized 'postcancer ' 'aftercancer ' medical care support service ( SMC ) ( i.e. , psychotherapeutic , relationship family , psychoeducational , wellness quality life ) 2 . Be locate within five borough New York City 3 . Have serve cancer patient 12 month longer , 4 . Be willing able identify Englishspeaking representative , 21 year age older designate key informant . We limit study provider agency hospital , diagnostic center , clinic , health human service agency , grassroots community organization public service setting offer program cancer survivor . Independent practitioner private practice setting survey . Our survey question intend major health service organization appropriate private practice setting . We use screen questionnaire determine give agency include exclude study AGENCY SCREENER .
